test_ad.title: Renault Wind 2011
test_ad.description: Roadster compact 2011, motor 1.2 benzină 100 CP, plafon decapotabil electric, interior sport semipiele, pilot automat, oglinzi electrice, stare foarte bună

script.content: Discover the thrill of the open road with this 2011 Renault Wind! Priced at just $6,500, this compact roadster features a 1.2L engine, electric convertible top, and sporty semi-leather interior. With automatic pilot and alloy wheels, it’s in very good condition. Don’t miss out—contact us today to make it yours!

captions.text: Discover the thrill of the Eippen road with this 2011 Renault Wind. Priced at just $6,500, this compact roadster features a 1.2-litre engine, electric convertible top and sporty semi-leather interior with automatic pilot and alloy wheels. It's in very good condition. Don't miss out, contact us today to make it yours.
